revision.comment: Created page with "Possibly: The original and institution of civil government, discuss'd. Viz. I. An examination of the patriarchal scheme of government. II. A defense of Mr. Hooker's judgment,..."
revision.text: Possibly: The original and institution of civil government, discuss'd. Viz. I. An examination of the patriarchal scheme of government. II. A defense of Mr. Hooker's judgment, &c. against the objections of several late writers. To which is added, A large answer to Dr. F. Atterbury's charge of rebellion: in which the substance of his late Latin sermon is produced, and fully examined. By Benjamin Hoadly. (London, Printed for J. Knapton, 1710). http://www.worldcat.org/oclc/977464765
